question: What is the suggested resource for obtaining a more in-depth understanding of the topics covered in the lesson notes?
response: To deepen your understanding of the topics covered in these lessons, consider exploring these resources: The Pandas Docs at https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/user_guide/, the Scikit-Learn Docs at https://scikit-learn.org/stable/user_guide.html, and the Seaborn Docs at https://seaborn.pydata.org/api.html. You can also refer to "Natural Language Processing in Action: Understanding, analyzing, and generating text with Python," Chapter 6, and the Gensim documentation available at https://radimrehurek.com/gensim/auto_examples/index.html#documentation.
